ygData.subject: Re: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, I tried to help some cleric who d lost his corpse in the lava in Sol A.  He was even trusting enough to /consent to me. My song pointed me down a
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> That said I'm still glad the time I lost my corpse to a fire giant
> summoning me that the GM considered it a bug and summoned my corpse to
> the zone. He said it was under a ledge somewhere in the lava where I
> never would have got it out.

Yeah, I tried to help some cleric who'd lost his corpse in the
lava in Sol A. He was even trusting enough to /consent to me.
My song pointed me down a lava ledge and I couldn't see a way
out (past the little "window" that looks into lava at the top
of the curved stairs near the entrance to Sol A). I assume it
leads to Sol B, but being one-way there was no way I could
drag his corpse back to him. Eventually a GM got his corpse
for him.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
